subject: Accepted desktop-base 4.0.1etch2 (source all)

Description: 
 desktop-base - common files for the Debian Desktop
Changes: 
 desktop-base (4.0.1etch2) stable; urgency=low
 .
   * Fix kde default wallpaper appearance between kdm to ksplash switch.
